sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default () => (

Operation Guide

Annotate text

Click a label listed in the right panel to active it. Then annotate whatever you want.

Connect annotations

Click a connection listed in the right panel to active it. Then connect two annotations by clicking them orderly.

Delete

Delete a label or connection by right clicking on it.

Download

Click the download button beside and get a snapshot SVG image.

);
